thread.title: Serah Blanche
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Serah Blanche

author: Serah Blanche
title: Serah Blanche
text: As frustrating as the process losing weight may seem, there is a simple and fast way to do so. Get yourself the book, The 2 Week Diet. Brian Flatt, who is the book's author, gives you a guideline of exactly the weight you desire within two weeks. The combination of his nutrition expertise and proven scientific methods incorporated in one book gives you a weight loss of 8-16 kgs within two weeks only. The book will help you achieve an impressive result in two weeks, which you would have done in 2 months using alternative weight loss methods.
